title: First-year & transfer applicants
requiredDocuments: Personal statement responding to two prompts
Optional creative portfolio for studio majors
scholarshipOverview: Automatic merit review plus need-based grants, housing bursaries, and work-study placements.
testingNotes: Standardised test scores are welcome but not required; share them if they strengthen your story.
additionalNotes: International students receive dedicated visa and relocation advising within 72 hours of admission.
supportContact: Ask an undergraduate admissions coach · weekdays 09:00–18:00 Harborbend time

title: Masters degree applicants
requiredDocuments: Official transcripts from all post-secondary institutions
Statement of purpose outlining goals and impact
Portfolio or writing sample where applicable
scholarshipOverview: Graduate assistantships, employer partnerships, and micro-grants for fieldwork and certification.
testingNotes: GRE or GMAT scores are optional; some programmes may request an interview or technical assessment.
additionalNotes: Applicants with three+ years of experience are eligible for the Professional Impact Scholarship.
supportContact: Connect with the graduate concierge team · grad-admissions@brillaracademy.example

title: Doctoral fellowship applicants
minimumGPA: 3.3 graduate GPA with evidence of research distinction
requiredDocuments: Research proposal aligned with a Brillar research cluster
Academic writing sample or published work
Funding plan or external sponsorship details (if applicable)
scholarshipOverview: Doctoral fellows receive multiyear stipends, tuition remission, and research travel allowances.
testingNotes: Select programmes may require a quantitative reasoning assessment during interviews.
additionalNotes: Faculty advisors review proposals prior to final decisions; connect early to refine your research focus.
supportContact: Email the doctoral pathways team · doctoral@brillaracademy.example
